posts.post_title: Wee Willie Keeler w/ Bat T206 Sweet Cap PSA 4.5 VG-EX+
posts.post_content:
$449 includes shipping, insurance, and delivery confirmation. PayPal, USPS money orders, and personal checks accepted.

This one is a beauty - sweet centering, sharp / vivid color, and NO creases.
